      Subclasses of MessageException in fr.sii.ogham.core.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InvalidMessageException
      Specialized exception that is thrown when a message is not valid (some fields are required or need to conform a particular format).
      class  MessageNotSentException
      This specialized exception indicates that the Message has not been send due to an error.
